entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
